content.prompt: The ability of relatively small European forces to conquer the powerful Aztec and Incan empires can be attributed to all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: lack of immunity to European diseases among Aztec and Incan peoples
ineffective defenses of Aztec and Incan cities
indigenous people's lack of familiarity with horses

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
